metadata_entries.title: Workshop #2: Content Framework
metadata_entries.summary: This outline captures a brainstorming session defining content types for a team workshop. The discussion includes moderators and contributors outlining and clarifying different content types to be used in their framework.
key_points: Definition of different content types with clear criteria
Team-based discussion format, moving section by section
Content typology intended for broader framework structuring

metadata_entries.title: 03 Section Details
metadata_entries.summary: The document details an ideation outline for further breaking down the content structure by section. Team members suggest specific elements that should be included within each part, focusing on clarity of sections like mission or anti-mission.
key_points: Expanding main content categories into detailed sections
Collaborative exchange on content structure specifics

metadata_entries.title: 10 Quality Standards
metadata_entries.summary: A framework for measuring and enforcing content quality standards is laid out in this outline. Focus areas include technical accuracy, code verifiability, and consistent referencing of sources or tests.
key_points: Standardization of quality metrics for content
Framework based on technical verification, reproducibility, and source citing
Explicit focus on measurable criteria in content production

data_points.context: must be supported by a source or test

metadata_entries.title: 12 Ethics Corrections
metadata_entries.summary: The outline sets forth ethical standards for content corrections, emphasizing transparency, giving corrections the same visibility as the original errors, and ensuring clear documentation of changes.
key_points: Corrections must be equally prominent as original errors
Introduce clear labeling and documentation for corrections
Timestamping and transparent explanations for each correction

data_points.context: corrections must match original error's visibility
to be placed in title for corrected items

metadata_entries.title: 04 Final Structure
metadata_entries.summary: This outline records the consensus reached on the final content structure after extensive team discussion. It compiles the synthesized vector wave style guide structure as agreed upon by the workshop participants.
key_points: Compiled consensus on content framework structure
Integration of previous discussions into a finalized style guide
